com.davidjarski.vfatreader

Class Bytes

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.davidjarski.vfatreader.Bytes

  • public class Bytes
extends java.lang.Object
    Bytes defines static methods for converting contiguous bytes into larger data types.
    Author:
    David Jarski (c) 2014-07-31

      • getShort

        public static short getShort(byte[] b,
             int offset)
        Converts two little-endian bytes into a short.
        Parameters:
        b - the byte array
        offset - the index of the first byte to read from the array
        Returns:
        the (big-endian) short

      • getAsciiString

        public static java.lang.String getAsciiString(byte[] b,
                              int offset,
                              int count)
        Converts a byte sequence into an String of ASCII characters. If a byte does not contain a valid ASCII text character, the byte is translated to the Unicode replacement character U+FFFD.
        Parameters:
        b - the byte array
        offset - the index of the first byte to read from the array
        count - the number of bytes to read from the array
        Returns:
        a String constructed from the specified byte sequence
